title: Looking for similars to Leitura
content: Any suggestions? specifically the Display(Roman) version.
author: Ratbaggy

comments.content:
Leitura seems to get too strong in stroke contrast, it's getting displayed on screen so the fine sections kinda just disappear. What IS working are the lovely g, large x height and friendly tittle.

thanks fontgrube - had actually forgotten about identifont similars. weird thing is, most of those suggested are actually sans...when I'm looking for serif.

----------  
**Paul**  
 [Design Studio Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816145059/http:/www.allthingsconsidered.com.au/)

<cite>weird thing is, most of those suggested are actually sans...when I’m looking for serif</cite>

Wrong starting point:  
 [http://www.identifont.com/find?similar=Leitura+Roman&q=Go](http://web.archive.org/web/20130816145059/http:/www.identifont.com/find?similar=Leitura+Roman&q=Go "http://www.identifont.com/find?similar=Leitura+Roman&q=Go")
